name: ICBM (itch)
description:
Be your own little nuclear power and flatten all your enemies, which are completely defenseless. Watch as your weapon's power grows comically stronger as the cities get only a little bit larger.

Every city is a uniquely created, randomly generated, and arbitrarily named for your enjoyment.

This is part of the Sub-Zero Squirrel "Game A Weekish" series in which SZS explores different concepts, mechanics, and ways of making games work. find out more by visiting reading our blog at

Sub-Zero Squirrel Blog

This is free, but any donations are greatly appreciated.

These games are not intended to be fully bug free, but they are intended to be replayable time and time again. Due to the nature of this project, it is unlikely that future updates will be uploaded.

HOW TO PLAY:
1. Spacebar to burn your rocket's engine.
2. Arrow keys control it's pitch.
3. Don't run out of fuel.
4. Blow up the city
5. PROFIT!

Enjoy!
~SZS
